actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to provide that June 14, 1977, shall be a legal public holiday, and to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the period of June 13, 1977, through June 19, 1977, as "Flag Week."

summary.text: Provides that June 14, 1977, Flag Day, shall be a legal public holiday. Authorizes and requests the President to designate June 13, 1977 through June 19, 1977 as "Flag Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide that June 14, 1977, shall be a legal public holiday, and to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the period of June 13, 1977, through June 19, 1977, as "Flag Week."
